page.title: 10 SUTTON FARM
page.content: My father's farm has 230 acres.It is 2 miles out of Masham. 160 acres is arable land. It is a mixed farm.We grow crops such as wheat,barley,and cale,but we also keep livestock mainly sheep and cattle.70 acres of grass land is used for silage and grazing.An extra 20 acres is woodland. I have 4 sheep and i sold my bullock for Â£620 at the end of October at a sale in Masham.I bought it for Â£300 a year ago. I looked after it each day.I fed it 1.5kg of cattle feed a day.When it was sold it weighed 475kg.I am saving money to buy another bullock. The week I sold it, it won first prize for best bullock. At the start of the Summer I sold 4 lambs for Â£21 each.I eventually hope to rent a field off my Dad and keep a field of bullocks.
